Posts.Content: hi DFishcake Thanks for sharing your experience - our circumstances do sound similar. Yes I’ve had an MRI after third chemo plus 3 D mammogram and ultrasound after fourth and final session. I asked whether full ANC was necessary and my case was discussed at MDT. Apparently v good response in affected lymph nodes (1-2) and good response in tumour. Don’t know if full pathological response yet. However, as I have only had 4x chemo rather than 6 sessions MDT don’t have enough evidence to support advising of lesser surgery. (I only had 4 x EC as Type 1 diabetic). I do have meeting with surgeon on 5th Jan so will discuss all this...... do have feeling that full ANC could be over treating but also v conscious that my brand of cancer is aggressive and needs to be stopped. A crystal ball would be handy........ Fx
